item.title: Xanthicon
item.description: A noxious agent brewed by the warriors of Xanthe, distilled from whole serpents, excrement, and deadly herbs reduced over a number of days in boiling cauldron.

item.title: Golden Bow
item.description: Bows used by the legendary archers of the City of Gold are made to enhance their supreme skill. Each has gold worked through the grain of the wood, appearing like an elegant kintsugi.

item.title: Arkanythera Mechanism
item.description: An Arkanythera Mechanism, known also as the “spell turner” is a finely crafted device designed to interrupt hostile spellcasting. Intricate clockwork is inscribed with runes representing the three moons, forces of Law and Chaos, as well as each of the base elements.

item.title: IX - Ambush on Pirate Island
item.description: Seek vengeance for Iris upon the Xanthian corsairs encamped in a nameless mystic isle. Brewing terrible poisons, working aquatic sorceries, and lead by crimson caped Admiral Myn the mercenaries of the City of Gold engage nefarious schemes; yet little do they know that this day the red moon witnesses the AMBUSH ON PIRATE ISLAND Notable Loot Arkanythera Mechanism Admiral Myn’s Crimson Cape 30 doses of Xanthicon Book on Summoning and Aquamancy Rapier +1 12 shortbows from the City of Gold .

item.title: X - Opportunities in the Ochre City
item.description: Storms sweep in from the north, forcing refuge on far-travelers. The world reduced to rain-sluiced streets and city walls, yet contained within a whole new realm opens up to the people of Aimilus.

item.title: Fontus the Oozemancer
item.description: acid burned face constantly weeping pores large jovial man of middle age Edges Once apprentice to Sabtah All-Grasping Divorced from a wealthy merchant of Amilus called Iris .

item.title: Asklepian Amoeba
item.description: Asklepian Amoeba, also known as Bandage Slimes, are neutered oozes which still retain a keen sense for blood but lack any digestive capabilities. As a result they make for aggressive bandages, seeking out wounds to prevent bleeding.

item.title: index
item.description: Welcome to the world of REALMLORDS.
